mapper.insert: insert into address_book(city_code, city_name, consignee, detail, district_code, district_name, id, is_default, label, phone, province_code, province_name, sex, user_id) values (#{cityCode}, #{cityName}, #{consignee}, #{detail}, #{districtCode}, #{districtName}, #{id}, #{isDefault}, #{label}, #{phone}, #{provinceCode}, #{provinceName}, #{sex}, #{userId})
